pages.text: Blink Spell Essence contains the concentrated magical properties of teleportation. Extracted from the Blink Flower Bloom, it embodies the ephemeral nature of space and dimensional boundaries.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: When cast directly, Blink Essence teleports you in the direction you're facing, allowing for quick traversal across short to medium distances.$(br2)Mana Cost: [value]$(br)Single-use when cast directly

pages.title: Extraction
pages.text: The extraction process requires a Blink Flower Bloom and specific stabilizing agents to contain the volatile dimensional energy during transformation.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: - Direct casting for mobility$(br)- Grafting onto a Living Staff$(br)- Creating teleportation devices$(br)- As a component in warp-related magical items$(br)- Dimensional stabilization in complex magical processes
